homepage.paragraph1: This application allows you to test and interact with various functionalities seamlessly. Below is an overview of the features:
homepage.feature1.name: User Management
homepage.feature1.description: Manage users, view user lists, and create new users with different permissions.
homepage.feature2.name: Language Selector
homepage.feature2.description: Choose your preferred language (English, Español, Français, etc.) to customize your experience.
homepage.feature3.name: Testing API Endpoints
homepage.feature3.description: Test API calls and interact with dynamic data.
homepage.feature4.name: Real-time Data
homepage.feature4.description: View real-time information from integrated services and APIs.
homepage.paragraph2: Whether you're verifying user roles or experimenting with our services, this app provides a straightforward interface to perform and visualize testing tasks.
catalog.filter.label: Filter
userManagement.listOfUsers.noPermission: The current user has no permission to read users.
userManagement.createUser.noPermission: The current user has no permission to create users.
userManagement.createUser.form.accessCat: Allows to navigate to the 'Catalog' menu
userManagement.createUser.form.accessUse: Allows to navigate to the 'User Management' menu
userManagement.createUser.form.createCat: Allows to create a new catalog.
userManagement.createUser.form.readUsers: Allows to read the list of users.
userManagement.createUser.form.createUse: Allows to create a new user.
userManagement.createUser.form.deleteUse: Allows to delete an existing user.
userManagement.createUser.form.errors.no: At least one permission should be assigned.
userManagement.deleteUser.noPermission: The current user has no permission to delete users.
errors.UNAUTHORIZED: At least one permission should be assigned.
errors.MISSING_PERMISSION: User does not have the required permission to perform the action.
errors.CANT_DELETE_ADMIN_USER: The admin user can't be deleted.
errors.CANT_DELETE_OWN_USER: You can't delete your own user.
